Package com.hotels.styx.api.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configuration
    Static configuration.
    Configuration.Context
    This should be removed if possible, as its creation was premature - intended for a use-case that we have not implemented.
    ConfigurationContextResolver
    Creates a new configuration context relative to the request.
    ConfigurationContextResolverFactory
    A factory that creates ConfigurationContextResolvers.
    ConfigurationFactory
    Factory for creating a Configuration.
    Converter
    A function that converts a source to targetType.
    ServiceFactory<E>
    A generic factory that can be implemented in order to facilitate creating objects whose type is not known until read from configuration.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration.MapBackedConfiguration
    Allows a configuration object to be programmatically created.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException
    This exception is thrown when there is a configuration problem.
    ConversionException
    An exception thrown when an attempt at converting a value from one type to another failed.
    MissingConfigurationException
    Exception thrown when some required configuration property is missing.
    NoSystemPropertyDefined
    Extension of ConfigurationException thrown when a system variable is undefined.
